response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm proposing a special introductory price of $120 for you. This is a great opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to the usual market price of $150. I trust it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
